resources.string: You may know little about your scammer, which is fine. You can enter one or more fields below.

Don\'t let scammers thrive in anonymity. \n \nJoin $safeprojectname$ today and be part of a global effort to expose fraudsters, protect innocent individuals, and ensure a safer online environment for all.
I received a security breach email informing of attempted unauthorised access to my bank accont and encouraging me to change my password. As a result, funds were taken without my knowledge."
